title: MindForge: AI-Powered Process Mapping & Business Intelligence
tagline: Turning text descriptions into interactive workflow visualizations

context.problem: Traditional process-mapping tools are complex, static, and inaccessible to non-technical users. Businesses need intuitive, AI-assisted workflow documentation.
constraints: Must work offline for sensitive business data
context.quote: What if you could just describe your process and see it mapped instantly?

solution.approach: AI-powered SaaS prototype combining conversational AI, automation logic, and dynamic SVG visualizations to help users describe workflows in plain language and generate optimized process maps.
bullets: React + Tailwind frontend with FastAPI backend
Integrated LLMs via LM Studio for offline processing
AI prompts identify inefficiencies and automation opportunities
Integrations with Google Sheets and custom APIs
